channel.title: Website approvals, suggestions, nominations, reviews, and more!
channel.description:
We are introducing a brand new board to the forum: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,217.0.html]Suggestions, Nominations, & Reviews[/url]. In this board, you can post any variety of suggestion, feedback, nominations (for positions and badges alike), or request your website be approved for posting all under one roof. The best part of this board is, your discussion with staff is entirely [b]private[/b]. You can learn more about it [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,546755.0.html]here[/url]. The staff will not judge you for anything you post, hence the privacy.
Also, please note that all currently approved websites are no longer considered approved. We are completely refreshing the list of approved sites. You need to use the new system to have your website reapproved. This warning will show up on other parts of the website as well. Thanks!
MoparScape Staff

item.title: Website approvals, suggestions, nominations, reviews, and more!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s because that thread was made public

To put it in perspective, there are 26 topics in there (not counting stickies), whereas the majority of you right now can see 4. People that made their own topics in there can see those too.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:444077”]So it was c changed from public to private? good idea actually. [/quote]It wasn’t ever public We can make threads public if we want, but by default they are private so only the maker can staff can see them.

item.title: Website approvals, suggestions, nominations, reviews, and more!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s already been put to good use! Remember if you have any questions about how the forums are run, suggestions, or decisions you think should be reviewed, you can post them there for a quick answer as well!

Keep in mind everything you say in there can only be seen by you and the staff, essentially giving you a direct line to all of us If it’s a good suggestion and you agree to it, it could become a public thread, and then maybe even get put into motion!

Read full topic

item.title: Website approvals, suggestions, nominations, reviews, and more!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

We are introducing a brand new board to the forum: Suggestions, Nominations, & Reviews. In this board, you can post any variety of suggestion, feedback, nominations (for positions and badges alike), or request your website be approved for posting all under one roof. The best part of this board is, your discussion with staff is entirely private. You can learn more about it here. The staff will not judge you for anything you post, hence the privacy.

Also, please note that all currently approved websites are no longer considered approved. We are completely refreshing the list of approved sites. You need to use the new system to have your website reapproved. This warning will show up on other parts of the website as well. Thanks!

MoparScape Staff
